title: Searge: 关于新的快照最后的透露
author: ouqianwei
txt_content:
本帖最后由 ouqianwei 于 2015-8-19 21:20 编辑 





Screenshot_2015-08-19-19-33-40_1439984096114.jpg (43.61 KB, 下载次数: 3)

下载附件

2015-8-19 19:37 上传






Searge: One last spoiler before the snapshot later. There won't be anything hidden about it. "/give @p command_block"is all you need to get started.
Searge: 在稍后的快照前的最后一个透露。将不会有任何隐藏的东西。你需要做的只是输入/give @p command_block【更新内容便会一目了然】。




Screenshot_2015-08-19-20-10-10_1439986260063.jpg (30.51 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2015-8-19 20:10 上传








IMG_20150819_201116.jpg (63.25 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2015-8-19 20:12 上传






Searge: Hey.Pssst.Do you want to buy one of these fancy new blocks?The orange ones are on sale today.
Searge: 嘿！你想买一个这种精美的新方块吗？橘黄色的今天打折。




Screenshot_2015-08-19-21-05-35_1439990354317.jpg (37.27 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2015-8-19 21:18 上传






Searge: Today is a good day, only few herrings are red. I'm almost done cleaning up some of the code that I wrote recently. So it's ready for use.
Searge: 今天是个好日子，没什么分散精力的事。我差不多已经清理完了我最近写的一些代码。所以可以用了。
